mapper.insert: insert into oa_act_regularization (id, title, `name`, department, `position`, education, entry_date, probation_period, self_assessment, annex, create_time, promoter, url) values (#{id},#{title},#{name},#{department},#{position},#{education},#{entryDate},#{probationPeriod},#{selfAssessment},#{annex},#{createTime},#{promoter},#{url})
